attributes.action: To raise awareness about gender equality/the impact on the world/the SDG goals
attributes.additional_details: The government has more connections to the wider world raising more awareness than just the local community and also so that the government helps us to tackle this issue together by working with us.
attributes.background: We want the government to spread awareness of this issue globally to ensure that every person knows about the gender issues we are facing in this world

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
